elements.text:
You are at a restaurant with some friends and go to use the restroom. When you come back to the table your friends are at, they stop their conversation and it's silent. 

Here are some thoughts that might pop into mind:

texts: Everyone must be noticing my new outfit.
They didn't expect me to come back so soon.
I might have something on my outfit, but I can go back to the bathroom and clean it off.
They might have been having a good time without me, but that doesn't mean they don't enjoy being my friends.
